entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
